node.sales_desc: This new tool from RockJock 4x4 is designed to make the assembly and disassembly of their popular Johnny Joint rod ends simple! Tool can be used either in a bench vise, or it can also be used on the vehicle for repairs and rebuilds of Johnny Joints. Construction is CNC machined heat treated steel components.

node.display_name: RockJock 4x4 Johnny Joint Weld-On Rod Ends
node.sales_desc: The RockJock Johnny Joint is the original urethane bushed spherical ball joint and still the undisputed leader in articulation and durability. The bushings in the Johnny Joint are made of a proprietary urethane that surrounds a smooth heat treated inner ball that rotates without binding, enabling Johnny Joints to last up to 10 times longer than the knock-off products that flood the market.

node.sales_desc: Bring a bold new look to your ride with the all-new ICON Alloys REBOUND! Combining sharp lines, a concave spoke design, and ICON-optimized" dimensions, these wheels will increase both the form and function of your Jeep, truck, or SUV. Staying true to the ICON Alloys approach, the REBOUND has been engineered to maximize caliper clearance and optimize wheel position for un-hindered suspension travel and steering function. Backspace dimensions and wheel offset have been strategically developed to reduce scrub radius, improving all-around handling and ride quality and making a set of these wheels the perfect complement to an ICON Vehicle Dynamics suspension system."

node.sales_desc: The 8900 Evolution 2 provides high performance 57 LED headlights. This headlight complies to meet the proposed National Highway Transportation Safety Administration (NHTSA) guidelines for a 5-Star NCAP-compliant low beam headlight. The Model 8900 Evolution 2 57 LED headlights offer a safety solution with improved light output, glare reduction, and light placement for heavy-duty trucking on-road."

node.sales_desc: Get the most stopping power out of your Jeep JK big brake upgrade. This booster & master cylinder upgrade is designed to match the fluid volume and pressure requirements of the larger dual piston calipers found in most JK big brake kits. This kit includes a perfromance matched brake booster and master cylinder combination that provides greater fluid volume and pressure assist required for the proper operation of larger dual-piston calipers fond in Jeep JK front big brake kits. Required for RockJock 60VXR and RockJock 70 front axle assemblies.

node.sales_desc:
The ORACLE Lighting Vector Series Grill for the Jeep Wrangler JK is the first full-featured replacement grill with integrated LED light emitters for Low Beam, High Beam, DRL, and Turn Signal Functionality. This unique design is equipped with a wide array of application specific LED Light emitters and has the aggressive styling that Jeep Wrangler owners crave. This system is fully assembled out of the box and ready to install using all of the factory mounting points.

The Vector Series Grill features an impressive 5,600 Combined Lumen Low Beam with advanced optics for precision lighting that illuminates the road without blinding oncoming traffic. 7,200 Combined Lumen High Beam for illuminating any dark landscape. The simple wiring connection is Plug and Play" thanks to the included harness adapter which makes installation easy.

Additional benefits include an integrated LED Daytime Running Light (DRL) which increases driver safety by making the Wrangler more visible to other drivers on the road. This DRL also features a unique "startup sequence" display. Another safety feature is the vivid amber linear LED Turn Signals that are 4x brighter than the factory turn signal lamp for increased visibility."

STI has taken the exciting new HD7 wheels and added radical radiant color. Bold new style plus acclaimed HD Alloy performance for enthusiasts who want to move up, way up. The HD7's unique style features six split spokes with an open design that keeps weight low and enhances the distinct appearance. Each of the three Radiant colors is completed with a clear-coat protective finish for added durability. The center cap on each wheel, with bold new HD Alloy" graphics, bolts on for extra secure connection."

Now in 20 sizes! Like all STI HD Alloy series wheels, the lightweight HD4 comes with a no-hassle Lifetime Structural Warranty, thanks to its unique inner and outer heavy-duty wheel lip reinforcement. The HD4 is both a beauty and a beast, boasting 1000 lbs load ratings for the 14", 15", 17" and the new 20" models. Mount the monster Out & Back Max'D mudder on the 20" HD4!

HD4 wheels are available in a striking Gloss Black finish with machined accents, chrome bolts and rivets, and a Hi-Gloss clear coat seal. The newest model in the HD4 line is made with a Matte Black finish."

STI's HD3 wheels, a valued member of the HD Alloy family, are available in two distinctive finishes, Machined with gloss black accents, and solid Gloss Black. Several offsets and bolt patterns make the eye-catching HD3 perfect for application on most popular ATV and side-by-side UTV models.

Low-profile center caps included with each wheel are perfectly matched to each finish. Like all STI HD Alloy series wheels, the lightweight HD3 comes with a lifetime structural warranty, by way of its unique inner and outer heavy-duty wheel lip reinforcement. The HD3 is as tough as it is classy, boasting load ratings of 1000 lbs. for both the 12 and 14" models."

The HD5 Beadlock line is also available in a 15 x 7 size. It features stronger 5/16 plated beadlock hardware to best handle the demands of today's machines. These HD5 Beadlocks are crafted to deliver the same strength and style as the trusted 14" HD5 Beadlock wheels. And like all STI HD Alloy wheels, the 15x7 Beadlocks are manufactured durability. As proof, they are backed by a Lifetime Structural Warranty."

Part of STI's HD Alloy wheel family, the HD6 wheels are available in three popular sizes: 17, 14", and 12". HD6 wheels are also available in three unique Radiant colors - Red, Blue, and Orange - in 14x7 sizing. A clear-coat finish helps protect the vibrant hues."

node.sales_desc: With a king-size 18 wheel towering atop the lineup - plus 17" and 14" sizes - the mega HD7 wheels from STI Tire & Wheel present bold new style plus acclaimed HD Alloy performance to enthusiasts who want to move up, way up. The new 14x7 2+5 offset is designed as a rear-wheel application for straight-axle ATVs. The HD7's unique style features six split spokes with an open design that keeps weight low and enhances the distinct appearance. The Matte Black-Smoke finish serves up shadowy silver spokes with matching mill cuts circling the rim. The Matte Black-Machined style presents a steely contrast. The center cap on each wheel, with bold new "HD Alloy" graphics, bolts on for extra secure connection."

The HD9 beadlock wheel delivers Baja-proven performance in a classic 8 spoke design - it's STI's strongest beadlock wheel line. The 10mm thick beadlock ring is secured by 5/16 grade 8 hardware for strength. The HD9 Comp Lock is available in in 14", 15" and 18" sizes, and in two finish options, Matte Black and Matte Black / Machined. Plus, a Bronze finish is available in 14" sizing. You can buy optional machine-matching color beadlock rings for 14" wheels too. This beadlock wheel includes a pre-installed valve stem with a black sleeve and matching cap. This ultra-strong beadlock wheel is built for competition, whether you're racing Baja or just beating your buddy up the rocky climb.

NOTE: 14x10 sizing is recommended for sand tires and sand dune use only."

The all-new STI HD10 wheels bring a fresh level of style and a higher level of size to the HD Alloy family with 20 applications, plus 15", 14" and 12" sizes. These new wheels are built with the same strength and durability as all HD Alloy wheels, and come with the STI lifetime warranty.

With their classic 8 spoke style and clean look, the HD10 wheels feature chrome bolt accents on top of four finish styles - gloss black, gloss black with machined, matte black with smoke, and the striking chrome finish that is ultra durable with triple plating.

A small and low-profile center cap bolts on securely. The wheels are designed to work with most stock Polaris lug nuts for convenience."

node.sales_desc:
The HD9 beadlock wheel delivers Baja-proven performance in a classic 8 spoke design - it's STI's strongest beadlock wheel line. The 10mm thick beadlock ring is secured by 5/16 grade 8 hardware for strength. The HD9 Comp Lock is available in in 14", 15" and 18" sizes, and in two finish options, Matte Black and Matte Black / Machined. Plus, a Bronze finish is available in 14" sizing. You can buy optional machine-matching color beadlock rings for 14" wheels too. This beadlock wheel includes a pre-installed valve stem with a black sleeve and matching cap. This ultra-strong beadlock wheel is built for competition, whether you're racing Baja or just beating your buddy up the rocky climb.

NOTE: 14x10 sizing is recommended for sand tires and sand dune use only."

The new STI HD5 Beadlock wheels are designed to deliver the ultimate combination of strength and style. In two finishes - Machined & Gloss Black, and Matte Black - the HD5 Beadlocks are available in two sizes - 14x7, and 15x7 - for today's high-performance heavyweight UTVs. The wheels feature a reinforced inner bead lip for durability, and the beadlock hardware is beefed up for increased tire-clamping pressure.

To deliver a customized look, you can choose from a wide selection of colored beadlock rings. There is one to match your vehicle, from RZR orange to Can-Am yellow to Kawasaki green. And a raw ring option lets you finish the ring in any color you need. These are the same durable and easy-to-install rings that come stock with the new HD5 Beadlock wheel.

STI introduces the HD A1, an all-new beadlock wheel that sets the stage for the future of beadlock performance. Focused on strength for today's newer and faster UTVs, the HD A1 wheel features a 10mm billet beadlock ring secured with 5/16 grade 8 hardware. Combined with the wheel's classic Baja style, this 12 spoke beauty improves the look and ride of any UTV. And with universal applications and 5+2 (+40mm) offset, the HD A1 fits nearly every UTV.

STI HD A1 Beadlock wheels have a 1200 lbs load rating. They are available in Machined and Matte Black - both with durable clear coat finishes - in 14x7 and 15x7 sizes. STI tires and wheels are sold by retailers across North America, through MTA Distributing (U.S.) and Motovan (Canada)."

STI introduces the HD A1, an all-new beadlock wheel that sets the stage for the future of beadlock performance. Focused on strength for today's newer and faster UTVs, the HD A1 wheel features a 10mm billet beadlock ring secured with 5/16 grade 8 hardware. Combined with the wheel's classic Baja style, this 12 spoke beauty improves the look and ride of any UTV. And with universal applications and 5+2 (+40mm) offset, the HD A1 fits nearly every UTV.

STI HD A1 Beadlock wheels have a 1200 lbs load rating. They are available in Machined and Matte Black - both with durable clear coat finishes - in 14x7 and 15x7 sizes. STI tires and wheels are sold by retailers across North America, through MTA Distributing (U.S.) and Motovan (Canada)."

STI's HD3 wheels, a valued member of the HD Alloy family, are available in two distinctive finishes, Machined with gloss black accents, and solid Gloss Black. Several offsets and bolt patterns make the eye-catching HD3 perfect for application on most popular ATV and side-by-side UTV models.

Low-profile center caps included with each wheel are perfectly matched to each finish. Like all STI HD Alloy series wheels, the lightweight HD3 comes with a lifetime structural warranty, by way of its unique inner and outer heavy-duty wheel lip reinforcement. The HD3 is as tough as it is classy, boasting load ratings of 1000 lbs. for both the 12- and 14-inch models.

You think the new X Comp tires look aggressive? Wait until you drive them! Underneath that merciless tread pattern is a two-stage, 10-ply rated radial featuring dual steel belts with nylon cap plies and polyester carcass. This unique LT-inspired design achieves a higher level of strength and ride comfort than any other UTV tire and exceeds DOT requirements.

The large footprint and multi-angle shoulder treads make massive traction in intermediate to hard terrain and at any direction angle. The advanced two-stage radial carcass provides greater uniformity and balance, and absorbs choppy terrain for superior ride comfort. Heavy-duty steel-belt plies increase durability, and a super-deep rim guard defends wheels from abuse. Toughness, comfort, and high-mileage durability; that's the STI X Comp ATR.

The all-new 35 STI Chicane tire is light weight, designed for 15" wheels, and provides UTV drivers with legendary handling performance and durability. An all-new 8-ply carcass gives outstanding bump absorption, ground-hugging tread and sidewall flex, and a smooth ride.

This new Chicane features a light-truck-inspired flatter profile and shoulder design, while incorporating the open-channel tread pattern of the original Chicane. With its wider contact patch, the new tire delivers sure-footed control in all terrain conditions.

Like all Chicane tires, the new 35" uses a deep rim guard and a reinforced bead/lower sidewall that allows lower PSI operation. The result is maximum tire performance and durability over a variety of terrain, without running overly high PSI to avoid flats. These tires are available now at powersports dealers throughout North America."

Today's high-end and high-performance UTVs demand larger-diameter tires, and STI answers the call with the all-new 33 x 10R-15 Chicane RX. With revised shoulder tread and a slightly narrower profile, these Chicanes give increased side-bite traction and minimal rolling resistance. They're lightweight, and DOT marked for versatility.

A unique split-knob non-directional tread design gives Chicane the best combination of steering and traction performance. The 8-ply rated carcass offers the perfect mix of high-mileage durability, light weight, and smooth ride flexibility. The tire's high-performance features include a deep rim guard and a reinforced bead/lower sidewall that allows lower PSI operation. The result is maximum tire performance and durability over a variety of terrain, without the need to run overly high PSI to avoid flats.

All Chicane RX tires are the result of STI's years of hands-on experience and proven testing. Featuring a unique split-knob non-directional tread design, the Chicane RX line is DOT marked and ready to hit the road for powerful performance and high-mileage value. In Best In The Desert" racing action, the Chicane is helping racers finish in the top 10 by providing top-notch traction, and reliable performance."

New 9.5 wide sizes are light weight and a great value! The STI Out & Back Max tires feature an aggressive tread pattern and true sizing designed to power today's everything through the mud, from large-bore UTVs to mid-size ATVs, and then get them back in comfort. In sizes from 26" up to 36", the Out & Back Max tires use stepped-lug construction and a rugged carcass for trusted performance in the sloppiest conditions.

Do your mud tires measure up to the Max?"

The Out & Back AT is designed to perform in all conditions, getting you out and back reliably and comfortably. The tread designs features a center V" tread pattern to deliver comfort and control on hardpack. At the same time, the 3/4" deep, dimpled lugs dig aggressively and cleanout well to keep you moving through deep and sticky mud. Wraparound shoulder lugs provide side bite.

Its 6-ply bias carcass and robust rim guard provides exceptional reliability while remaining surprisingly light. The result is a tire that lives up to its name. If you're going way out and want to get back, get outfitted with a set of STI Out & Back tires. For more aggressive options, check out the large family of Out & Back tires, including the XT, XLT and Out & Back Max tires."

node.long_desc: Tire Size: 28x10.00R14;Black Sidewall;Front sand tire;Tire Height: 28 Inch;Wheel Size: 14 Inch;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The UTV series of the Sand Blaster tire from Sand Tires Unlimited was designed as a down scale Razor Back tire. Razor Back tires offer increased steering response over desert tires while offering improved flotation for the sand. Razor Backs feature multiple offset ridges on a smooth style tire which offers increased side bite for improved steering without digging too much into the sand or increasing rolling resistance. This improves the UTV Foots steering response and reduces understeer. For front sand tires, you are going to need to know if the tire will rub your car when you turn all the way left or all the way right. If you do not have tires yet, turn your steering wheel all the way to one side. Measure from the center of the spindle towards your chassis and double that dimension. For example, if from your spindle to your chassis you have 15 Inch then a 30 Inch diameter tire is going to rub the side of your vehicle and you will need something smaller in diameter or you are going to have to limit your turning radius.

node.sales_desc: While many side accessories feature a universal track mounting system for easier installation and inventory requirements, the ARIES mounting system takes things a step further. ARIES mounting system uses a single set of vehicle-specific brackets to accommodate different side accessory options. This not only means different finish options but also different products entirely. The ARIES mounting system mounting system saves you time and money. It eliminates the need to purchase and install an entirely new set of mounting brackets with each new side accessory. The mounting brackets are available for purchase as a stand-alone item or as part of a complete kit with compatible side bars and running boards. Use the application information to determine which part numbers will fit your vehicle.

Pair;The Corbeau Sportline RRX Jeep seats are the perfect blend of aggressive lateral bolster support but with the comfort of a daily driver;The seats has top of the line top of the line injection molded foam and is harness capable;These Jeep Wrangler Seats can accommodate a 5 or 6 point harness belt;These Wrangler and CJ seats will fit up to a 38-inch waist;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Sportline RRX seat is a favorite among customers worldwide because of its looks and incredible comfort. It is a perfect blend of aggressive lateral bolster support but with the comfort of a daily driver. Whether you are on the street, the track, or off road, you can't go wrong with the RRX. The new Sportline series from Corbeau factors in feedback from customers all over the world to come up with a look and feel that is second to none. Unbelievable comfort, style, and support are put into every inch of this seat. It features top of the line injection molded foam, strategically placed bolsters to support you in just the right places, and harness belt capability. The Sportline RRX seat is available in our Jacquard black Cloth with a Black Vinyl/Grey Carbon Fiber Vinyl and a Black Vinyl/Black Carbon Fiber Vinyl. The Jacquard cloth is known in the aftermarket seating industry as being among the most durable of any cloth material. The RRX has a seat base height of only 2.5 inches. That means is if you sit the seat on the floor, the distance between the floor and where you would sit is 2.5 inches.

node.sales_desc: Equal-i-zer Hitch Shanks are built from the highest-grade of American steel. The adjustability measurement for the shanks is measured from the inside top of the receiver to the base of the hitch ball.

node.long_desc: Patented weight distribution head;(2) Sway control brackets;(2) Spring bars;Snap-up lever;Spacer rivet and washers;Hitch pin and clip;Necessary installation hardware;Limited lifetime warranty
node.sales_desc: The Equal-i-zer hitch eliminates the need for add-on sway control devices and the hassle that goes along with them. With an Equal-i-zer hitch you don't have to worry about restrictions on backing up or a tight turning radius. There's nothing extra to hook up or take off. When the weight distribution is engaged, the sway control is engaged too, providing your family the best protection possible.

node.display_name: Fastway Flash Solid Steel Adjustable Ball Mounts
node.long_desc: Chrome hitch balls;Made to tow your heaviest trailers;Forged steel for exceptional strength;Black powder coat finish resists rust;Glossy finish looks fantastic on your truck;Solid shank, for more towing capacity and durability than any other ball mount on the road
node.sales_desc: With massive tow ratings and a solid shank made from forged steel, the SSBM is the strongest steel ball mount on the road. It offers commercial-grade towing capacity, with durability and exceptional strength. Its gorgeous, glossy finish looks fantastic on your truck and resists rust in the harshest environments.

The Nitto Trail Grappler SxS tire brings the durability and performance of the Trail Grappler M/T to Side-by-Side drivers.

Developed to compete in the King of the Hammers UTV class race, the Trail Grappler SxS has been tested in the harshest off-road racing environments by the champions. Trail Grappler SxS not only features the iconic tread pattern of its big brother, but it also carries on Nitto's DNA of race-proven technology.

Tread Block Arrangement

Using 3D computer simulation, Nitto's engineers were able to adopt the iconic Trail Grappler M/T pattern specifically for a Side-by-Side use.

Uniform Construction

Nitto's proprietary, automated manufacturing system produces extraordinarily uniform tires. This creates an easy to balance tire and a smooth ride.

Durability

Developed for the King of the Hammers UTV class race, and tested by the Hammers champions, the Trail Grappler SxS carries on the reputation for durability just like its 40 big brother.

Mud Evacuation

The balanced void ratio efficiently removes mud and dirt from the tread to provide continuous off-road traction."

node.sales_desc: RockJock 4x4 Heavy Duty Motor Mounts feature super heavy duty construction with large diameter urethane inserts to absorb vibration. RockJock's motor mounts include all necessary mounting hardware. Available in stock or raised height applications.

node.display_name: RockJock 4x4 Front End Housing Johnny Joint Kits
node.sales_desc: Replace the front differential housing upper control arm bushings on your 2007-2018 Jeep JK Wrangler vehicle with Johnny Joint rod ends from RockJock to get maximum articulation out of your suspension! This kit includes a Johnny Joint insert for gear case ear and installation tool, as well as 1 thick flame-cut steel upright for the tube side, with the Johnny Joint already installed. This kit has you cut off the top of the stock bracket that is on the tube and install the new RockJock piece into the existing bracket base. You then weld the RockJock piece to the existing bracket base. This allows for no welding to be done on the tube, resulting in no warpage of the tube.This kit requires cutting and welding equipment for installation!!! Greasable hardware included."

The Bar Pin Eliminators keep the bushings on the front and rear shocks from sliding during the suspension articulation that occurs in off road driving. The original bar pin mounts are not capable of sustaining the abuse of rock crawling. These heavy duty components are machined from billet stock and are gold zinc plated for long life. Sold as a kit.

node.sales_desc:
Protect your paint and give your door sills an eye-catching look with Rough Country's Entry Guards. This easy-to-install upgrade helps protect this high-traffic area from scratches, rocks, and other damaging debris.

Rough Country's Entry Guards are engineered from an incredibly durable injection molded material to provide years and years of protection. Thanks to the included 3M adhesive strip, installation is a flash. Give your vehicle the finishing touch with this easy upgrade!

node.display_name: Rough Country Heavy Duty Cargo Liners
node.long_desc: Quick and easy installation;Meticulously engineered to fit each vehicle exactly right;All weather protection against Snow, Mud, Sand, Salt Water and More!;Resist extreme temperatures;Protect against soda, coffee spills or accidents;Spill saver lip - prevents spills from reaching the carpet;Textured surface keeps feet from slipping;Eco-friendly, low density polyethylene provides full flexibility to ensure a lasting shape;Easy to clean and maintain - detachable from vehicle
node.sales_desc:
Keep your carpet in pristine condition with Rough Country's Floor Armor: Heavy Duty Floor Mats and Rear Cargo Liners. These eco-friendly, semi-flexible floor mats are made of an ultra-durable Polyethylene that offers a strong, rigid shape that's incredibly easy to clean.

Where simple rubber floor mats fail, Rough Country's line of Floor Armor is guaranteed for life and will never crack, split, or break-down over time. The high-quality design extends the lifespan of your carpets and the raised-lip design insures your interior will always be protected from mud, moisture, and more.

These contoured floor mats are laser-measured for each make and model, designed to be a precise fit that grips the carpet and stays put. An aggressive looking textured surface gives your muddy shoes plenty of traction and looks great inside the vehicle.

No matter what you track in, Rough Country Floor Armor is incredibly easy to clean. Just pop them out of the floorboards and rinse away the dirt! Includes Rough Country's Lifetime Replacement Warranty.

node.long_desc: 6 foot long;1/2 inch kinetic recovery ropeIntegrated loop end;Integrated cast steel clasp;UV, chew, and slobber resistant coating;Breaking strength of 11,700 lbs.;Stretches 10 percent;Availabe in green and charcoal gray
node.sales_desc:
Here's some VooDoo your best friend will certainly appreciate: Introducing the new VooDoo Offroad Leash made from the same 1/2 inch Kinetic Recovery Rope we use to recover stuck UTVs!

VooDoo's 6 foot leashes have a breaking point of 11,700 lbs strong enough to wrangle a small Asian elephant (if you have one). They also feature a tough UV, chew, and slobber resistant coating. VooDoo Offroad Leashes are available in VooDoo green or gray, and have an integrated loop handle on one end and an integrated clasp on the other.

node.long_desc: 3.0 OD steel body with Cerakote finish 120 hour salt spray;2.75" OD billet aluminum piston;1-1/4" OD Nitrosteel black piston rod;Viton seals;Exotic valve stack;600lb. Eibach coil springs;2.5" OD aluminum reservoir with compression adjuster;5/8" upper spherical ball mounting ends;7/8" lower spherical ball mounting ends;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
These race quality Coilovers directly replace the stock Raptor Coilovers with improved offroad damping for aggressive driving in the most punishing conditions. They provide an additional 10% of wheel travel for a total of 11 when used with uniball upper control arms.The Dirt Logic 3.0 shocks are constructed with a steel body and finished in a tactical black Cerakote coating for extreme durability. This coating provides 120 hour salt spray compared to zinc plated shocks only going 48 hour salt spray. NitroSteel 1-1/4" piston rods are utilized to repel rock chipping while providing superior corrosion resistance.

The cold wound Eibach coil springs have a 600lb. spring rate to properly hold the weight of the Raptor. They work perfectly with the proprietary valving of the Dirt Logic 3.0 Coilovers for high speed offroad use.

The remote 2.5 reservoir features a compression adjuster that allows increased damping for aggressive driving. The reservoir is mounted to the side of the frame allowing access to the large twist knob for fast and easy adjustments to the compression valving.

High tolerance internal components feature Viton seals and a 2.75 OD billet piston with variable flow bleed ports. It provides a compliant ride at low speed yet able to handle big impact hits with ease.

Completing the blacked out appearance of these Raptor Coilovers is the polished and black anodized aluminum components. They offset the matte Cerakote finish for a subtle yet bold statement.

These Dirt Logic 3.0 Coilovers are an upgrade in quality and performance from the stock Raptor shocks that will be appreciated once behind the wheel in rugged offroad conditions."

Available with or without shocks;Adjustable Alpine Control Arms balance front caster angle and pinion angles;Optimize rear pinion angles on 0-4.5 lift kits;Delivers true Cross-Trail (CT) performance;Dependable performance with zero worries;Positive, responsive handling with reduced NVH;High-quality, maintenance-free factory-style bushings provide excellent vibration damping and ride quality;Falcon Progressive Front & Rear Bump Stops provide progressive compression during high-speed suspension movement;Adjustable Alpine IR Front Track Bar and Front (3.5"+) and Rear Track Bar Brackets improve steering response, center axles to optimize vehicle roll center, and reduce body roll for unsurpassed handling;Full range of movement for off-road flex and articulation;Install and drive simple bolt-on installation no welding required;TeraFlex Lifetime Warranty;Requires aftermarket wheels with 4.75" backspacing or less or Offset Wheel Adapters for stock wheels NOT INCLUDED"
node.sales_desc:
TeraFlex Alpine CT (Cross-Trail) Suspension Systems build on TeraFlex's Sport ST (Street & Trail) Suspension Systems.

The 2.5 Alpine CT2 Short Arm Suspension System was designed for the enthusiast who wants to fine tune their suspension. Alpine Control Arms allow tuning of the caster and pinon angles, centering of the axles in the wheel wells, and wheelbase adjustment. The zero-maintenance adjustable control arms make the Alpine CT2 the perfect all-around suspension system.

Adjustable Alpine Control Arms tune caster angle, anti-squat geometry, and tire position. The adjustable Alpine IR Front Track Bar and Front (3.5"+) and Rear Track Bar Brackets improve steering response, optimize vehicle roll center, and reduce body roll to for unsurpassed handling.

This results in improved suspension geometry and relaxed control arm angles for a superior ride quality and performance regardless of terrain. These systems restore front and rear roll axis angles to minimize brake dive and acceleration squat. TeraFlex suspension systems provide reduced noise, vibration, and harshness (NVH).

Alpine CT Suspension Systems are engineered for hardcore Jeeping without sacrificing weekday ride comfort!

TeraFlex recommends Falcon SP2 Mode Adjust Performance Shocks for the kits without shocks. Falcon shock absorbers and TeraFlex lift coil springs have been engineered together to improve both compression and rebound for optimal vehicle stability. The Alpine CT2 Suspension System is offered with a choice Falcon SP2 3.3 Fast Adjust Piggyback Shocks, Falcon SP2 3.1 Piggyback Shocks, Falcon SP2 2.1 Monotube Shocks, or without shock absorbers."

node.sales_desc: The all new Rubicon Express Neutral Force Steering Stabilizer is the ideal addition to help reduce steering vibration, wear and tear of your steering components and provides ultimate control in your steering of your JK Wrangler. The internal spring neutralizes the gas pressure preventing a push in the direction opposite the shaft. Traditional stabilizers create a non-linear steering response or a push to one side as the shock wants to extend on itself. By contrast, Rubicon Express offers adjustability and a negative spring inside the stabilizer which offsets the force generated by increased gas pressure caused by the shaft displacing fluid inside the stabilizer.

node.display_name: G2 CORE Dual Rate Sway Bar Systems
node.long_desc: Reduces body roll and provides stable highway driving capabilities;Allows full suspension travel while off-roading without removing sway bar linkage;Multiple end link positions for adjustability;The DRS System is designed to work with existing on board air compressor systems, and can be disengaged and re-engaged on the fly;The DRS Body is fully sealed for maintenance free use and is built from 6061 aluminum for superior corrosion resistance;Included: G2 DRS POD Switch, wiring harness, air compressor solenoid, and mounting hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The G2 Core DRS is a state-of-the-art off-road sway bar system for your Jeep Wrangler JK. Crawling on the ground to disconnect your sway bar links, forgetting to disconnect entirely or running without a sway bar can be a thing of the past. The DRS features two heat-treated chromoly shafts that work in unison via a hardened 4140 steel locking assembly. When engaged, the first and second stage torsion bars work together to provide rigid on-road stability that gives up to 20% more articulation than the stock sway bar. A switch inside the cabin of the Jeep controls a pneumatically actuated mechanism that disengages the primary 1-1/2-inch diameter first stage torsion bar, freeing up the suspension to move substantially more. The second stage 5/8-inch torsion bar remains engages and has a lighter spring rate to give minimal anti-roll leverage. The system is designed to work with existing on-board air compressor systems, can be disengaged and reengaged on the fly, and defaults to the engaged position as a safety precaution. The G2 Core DRS body is fully sealed for maintenance free use and is built from 6061 aluminum for superior corrosion resistance. The arms are built from 4140 chromoly steel and feature multiple attachment points to further fine tune the handling of your vehicle. The system can also accommodate manual sway bar disconnect links to completely disconnect the sway bar from the front differential.

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge Trekker Winch Wireless Remote Control
node.long_desc: Wireless replacement for Rugged Ridge Trekker winches;For use with either 10,000 and 12,500 lb. Trekker Series winches
node.sales_desc: The Rugged Ridge Trekker Series of electric recovery winches offer today's off-road enthusiast trail-proven reliability and impressive power, with the quality and features that ravage the competition. This replacement wireless remote control is for use with both 10,000 and 12,500 lb. Trekker Series winches by Rugged Ridge, delivering the operator the convenience and greater freedom of control.

The Rugged Ridge Trekker Series of electric recovery winches offer today's off-road enthusiast trail-proven reliability and impressive power, with the quality and features that ravage the competition. The brawn behind the Trekker Series lineup is the heavy duty 5.6 / 6.6 series-wound motor that delivers consistent pull strength through a bulletproof 3-stage planetary drive gear. A 212:1 gear ratio means you see quicker line speeds, getting you back to wheeling in record time. And since the real world is where these winches really shine, we equipped them to survive in the worst conditions imaginable. With an IP-68 waterproof rating, they are practically impervious to all the water, dirt and sand that leaves lesser winches in a billow of smoke. Trekker Series Winches are available with a handy wireless remote and 26-meter synthetic line or with a traditional steel cable and a weatherproof wired remote. Best of all, we back every one with an industry-leading five year limited warranty.

Every Lockstraps strap comes with a braided steel cable running the entire length of the strap. Only the most prepared criminals will be able to get through - eliminating all thefts of opportunity.

Solid industrial strength construction means Lockstraps are made to take any kind of abuse you can dish out. Working load of up to 225kg.

Built in soft tie extensions means No More Scratches! Lockstraps makes sure the locks are nowhere near your paint job or plastics so you don't have to worry.
Omix-ADA proudly offers high-quality replacement parts so that you can keep you part of the Jeep heritage on the road- parts that always meet or exceed manufacturer's specs for quality you can trust.

node.long_desc: Gas / Oil separated - eliminates cavitation;5/8 hard chrome plated shaft;Rebuildable and revalvable;Two-stage sealing system - Dirt out, oil in;Nitrogen charged internal chamber;Designed for use on leveled and mild lifted vehicles;Developed for use with larger oversized wheels and tires;Made in USA"
node.sales_desc:
Engineered for driving enthusiasts who demand a specialized shock for their lifted or leveled truck.

ReadyLIFT, the company that started a revolution in truck & SUV Leveling now gives you the opportunity to own the SST3000 black series Performance Tuned Shocks feature custom valving for each application, ensuring a comfortable ride both on and off road!

Every SST3000 Shock is completely manufactured right here in the North America!

Expanded twin tube design provides increased fluid capacity for reduced internal temperatures. SST3000 shocks improve overall vehicle performance whether on the back roads in the country, cruising down the highway or battling the rough and tumble commute on urban streets. Every SST3000 shock is specially engineered for driving enthusiasts who demand a specialized shock for their lifted or leveled truck. Trucks with larger diameter wheels and tires require a shock engineered with valving designed to control the heavy forces. ReadyLIFT SST3000 performance-tuned shocks deliver the control you need.

node.long_desc: Available in 9,500 or 12,000lb. line pull;Steel cable with roller fairlead or synthetic cable with hawse fairlead;Stronger. Faster. Easiest to Use.;Powerful, Industry-Best 7.0 HP Motor;Increased Line Speed over Gen2;Innovative New Load Indicator Warning System;Onboard lighting features for quick nighttime recovery;High-Viz Clutch Lever;Controller Flashlight and Dual Magnet Mounts;Moveable Control Box with 12V Accessory Power Post;Customizable, Detachable Body Armor;Daytime Running Light;3-Stage Planetary Gear System;Forged Gears and Silicon Steel Plate Rotor;International Waterproof Rating - IP67;Electrical Warranty - 5 Years;Mechanical Warranty - Lifetime
node.sales_desc:
Faster. Stronger. Easiest to Use.

The all-new XRC Gen3 Winch by Smittybilt has been designed from the ground up with innovative, user-friendly features and improved power efficiency.

The 7.0 horsepower motor boasts an average line speed increase of 12% over its Gen2 predecessor, adding more speed and power with less AMP draw at load. The ergonomic remote controller has a Load Indicator Warning System, so you will always know how much your equipment can handle.

Winching in dark conditions is also a breeze with the remote's built-in flashlight. If additional light is needed, a 12-volt power post is located on the control box.

Two magnets are built into the controller for easy placement on any metal surface, leaving it out of the way when not needed. A high-viz clutch lever features large lettering, allowing you to see whether your winch is engaged/free spooled at a glance. Stylish body armor can be detached or used to customize your winch to your vehicle.

The XRC Gen3 winch is available with 9.5k and 12k load-capacity options, and the COMP Series upgrade includes a synthetic rope and aluminum hawse fairlead.

Buy with confidence these winches are backed by a lifetime mechanical warranty, a 5-year electrical warranty, and Smittybilt's legendary customer service.

Installation is a breeze, with no drilling required! Simply bolt-on this upgrade and attach your winch and you're ready for whatever the trail throws your way.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Journey Matte Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Journey is a strong yet minimal ten-spoke design catered towards heavy-duty off-road and street use. With wide spokes and a flat wheel profile, the Journey provides styling enhancements that exemplify additional structural strength. The wheel is engineered with a load rating of 3,300 lbs/wheel for compatibility with heavy duty commercial vans. Specialized wheel fitments include the Mercedes-Benz Sprinter, Dodge Promaster, and Ford Transit. The Journey is available in two standard finishes; Matte Black and Gunmetal with Machined Face.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Havasu Matte Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Havasu is an off-road inspired twelve-spoke design catered towards heavy-duty off-road and street use. With minimal spokes and a flat wheel profile, the Havasu provides styling enhancements that exemplify additional structural strength. The wheel is engineered with a load rating of 3,300 lbs/wheel for compatibility with heavy duty commercial vans. Specialized wheel fitments include the Mercedes-Benz Sprinter, Dodge Promaster, and Ford Transit. The Black Rhino Havasu is exclusively available in a Matte Black finish.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Highland Matte Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Highland is the spiritual successor to the Black Rhino Sidewinder off-road truck and SUV wheel. For years, the Sidewinder had dominated trucks with popularity with its distinct bowled multi-spoke design. The Highland takes this a step further by refining this popular style with broadened spokes met with CNC machined edges that latch onto the edge with a bold hex bolt. The Black Rhino logo is proudly carved into the wheel edge as well, and the wheel is updated with a new sleek center cap for 2018. The Highland comes in 17x9.5, 18x9.5, and 20x9.5 with ET12, ET0, and ET-12 offsets. The aftermarket wheel comes in 5-lug and 6-lug PCD's available in a Matte Black with CNC machined surfaces and Silver bolts.

Established in 2009 by MHT Luxury Alloys, one of the most trusted and time-tested names in the business, Fuel Off-road has been capturing the attention of off road enthusiasts with our cutting edge designs, fitments, and technological advancements.

The Addict 2 is the perfect wheel for these few. An updated version of the iconic Addict, the classic eight-spoked Addict 2 gives you the choice of a variety of color finishes with a matte black race inspired bead lock ring.

Features
- Updated version of the popular Addict wheel
- Classic straight eight-spoke design
- Desert inspired race bead ring

XS235 Grenade Beadlock: Pull the pin and let it fly! The Grenade OR is primed to completely set off your ride. A split eight-spoke mesh has a powerful, yet respectable style that is both race and street inspired. Cast aluminum construction means it can take what any terrain dishes out.

Features

- Desert inspired race bead ring

node.display_name: Method Race Wheels Beadlock Spacer Kits
node.sales_desc:
Beadlock spacers are needed when an excessively thick tire bead is causing assembly issues such as bolt heads shearing off at low torque values.

14 UTV beadlock spacers increase bead allowance by 1/8" (0.125")

15" & 17" beadlock spacers increase bead allowance by 3/16" (0.1875")

UTV beadlock wheels typically require spacer kits when mounting light truck tires

Truck wheels typically require spacer kits when mounting tires 37" and up on wheels utilizing the Method V.1 beadlock ring"

Specifically developed for the harsh terrain of today's UTV race team, the MotoVator is loaded with cutting edge engineering, improved safety and top notch performance. The MotoVator is a true radial, steel belted, puncture resistant tire, capable of high speeds on any hard pack surface. Utilizing light truck engineering, the inner and outer bead are steel belted to ensure the smoothest, quietest ride quality on the market. The unique center tread pattern provides a huge contact patch to ensure when you mash your pedal, your machine responds. The elongated shoulder tread improves high and low speed cornering with reduced rolling resistance. Tires are evolving, the MotoVator is the finest UTV tire you can get for your money, hands down.

Assault Industries black ops heavy duty axles are the perfect upgrade to enhance driveline durability on your UTV. They're bigger and stronger than stock and carry a 1 year warranty! The vehicle options listed for this product will work in a left or right installation configuration.

Black Ops axles are manufactured using 4340 chromoly steel, with enlarged CV joints and center shafts for added strength. The axle components are dual heat treated and precision machined to maximize performance by up to 35% over OEM axles. The proprietary cage design also improves durability. Molybdenum grease, which is a long lasting, extremely low wear lubricant is used inside the boots to reduce wear and galling on internal components.

The thermoplastic elastomer (TPEE) boot is extremely flexible and resists tearing. The inboard joint is designed to allow up to 40 degrees of articulation, while the outboard joint articulation ranges from 45-47 degrees. Each axle comes ready to install with a brand new castle nut and cotter pin.

PACKAGE CONTENTS
1 - Front Axle (Left or Right)
Castle Nut
Cotter Pin

node.long_desc: Replace uni-ball right on the vehicle;No more lugging heavy, awkward parts around;Fast and easy operation
node.sales_desc: AGM's uni-ball tool's compact size and easy operation allows you to replace a uni-ball without ever having to remove the suspension or steering components from the vehicle. High strength steel construction will give you the reliability to perform the repair over and over again. So whether it's in your shop or alongside the race course. node.display_name: All German Motorsports Dakar Series Jack System Complete Kits
node.long_desc: One-person tire changes in less than 90 seconds;Lightweight, fast, and reliable
node.sales_desc:
The AGM Dakar Series Jacking System ties into your existing hydraulic power steering system, though a 100% mechanical control manifold. With fewer moving parts and no electrical components, this allows the Control Manifold to be small, light and more reliable. This small size also makes it easy to mount within the driver's reach, allowing him/her to raise or lower the vehicle without ever unbuckling their seat belt.

With the system handling all the lifting, the co-driver/navigator can now do the tire change completely on their own and in a fraction of their previous time; while the driver stays relaxed focused on the race.

The system can also be used (in some situations) to get your vehicle unstuck without the driver or co-driver ever having to get out, reducing down time, physical fatigue and increasing safety exponentially.

The Dakar Series Jacking System is offered in three different travel lengths to accommodate your chassis and suspension geometry: Those travel lengths are 24, 30" and 33". You can further customize the system to your needs by choosing either 8" diameter "Baja" pads or a 12" diameter Dakar pads for each Jack.

Each Dakar Series Jacking Systems includes: 1 Control Manifold, 1 Hydraulic Line Kit, 2 Service Wrenches (2" & 2 3/4"), 2 Upper Chassis Mounts (standard or lightweight) and a Mounting Hardware Kit."

node.display_name: All German Motorsports Acu-Center Tie Rod End Tools
node.long_desc: Provides fast, repeatable rod end service and replacement;Sizes included in kit: 1/4, 5/16", 3/8", 1/2", 5/8", 3/4", 7/8", 1""
node.sales_desc:
AGM's Acu-Center tool is a precision measuring aid designed to provide fast, repeatable rod end service and replacement by providing its user with the most accurate rod end adjusted length measurement possible.

This is accomplished through the Acu-Center's precision fit, rod end / ball centering flange and absolute zero measuring point. So whether you're on the street, in the dirt, up in the air, on the job site or at play, the AGM Acu-Center tool is guaranteed to make your rod end replacement faster, easier and 100% accurate.

Sizes included in kit- 1/4, 5/16, 3/8, 1/2, 5/8, 3/4 , 7/8, 1

The high-impact, polycarbonate and flexible over-molded strain relief is super-sized for durability and ridged for positive grip. node.display_name: ITP Tornado Storm Series Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: The powerful Tornado wheel spins circles around the competition with its head-turning design, outstanding load rating and unbeatable durability. Industry Leading Performance, ITP tires and wheels meet the demands of today's off-road enthusiasts by delivering unequalled traction, precise handling and exceptional durability to overcome the world's most challenging terrain. In the lab and on the test field, the ITP team works hands-on to ensure that each tire made outperforms the competition. The imaginative engineering team at ITP continually pushes the envelope with tire-and-wheel innovations that answer demands for new vehicle introductions, durability requirements and fitment upgrades. ITP is the World's #1 ATV / UTV Aftermarket Tire & Wheel Source and is dedicated to always improving your off-road riding experience. We will continue to deliver the finest ATV, UTV and SxS tires and wheels in the industry. ITP is pleased to adhere to your strict standards and promise to meet your expectations. Since 1982, ITP has been the world's #1 ATV / UTV aftermarket tire and wheel source. The premier ITP products are developed utilizing an experienced staff of engineers, designers and technicians at its two American tire facilities in Clinton, Tennessee, and Jackson, Tennessee, to develop award-winning tire-and-wheel designs for virtually all ATVs and side-by-side vehicles.

node.sales_desc: These universal floor liners from Rugged Ridge are molded in Graphite Black from a durable high-quality thermoplastic that withstands the elements while special nibs on the liners back help keep the mats firmly in place on any carpeted surface. Designed to protect your car's interior carpet from damage, these floor liners can be easily trimmed to a wide variety of applications. Molded patterns in the liner help channel water while serving as a guide for trimming the liner to any shape and contour.

node.sales_desc: Equipping your Gladiator for adventure has just gotten easier! The Rugged Ridge Armis Swing Case makes it easy to access all of your gear, tools, or whatever you choose to carry in a safe and convenient location just inside your JT's tailgate. The sleek pull-action lever gives smooth access to the Armis Swing Case without the need to climb into the bed. With just a touch, the Armis Swing Case rotates outward to you for almost-effortless loading. Constructed from a lightweight, high-impact ABS plastic, the Armis Swing Case is tough, weather-resistant and custom-fitted specifically for the Gladiator. The Armis Swing Case is a premium yet affordable storage solution and is backed by a Limited 5-Year Warranty.

The new N-FAB TrailSlider is a body-mount rock slider that features 3/16 heavy gauge steel tubing and gussets that will hold up to extreme conditions. The TrailSlider also comes powder-coated in Nfab's durable, textured black finish. Easy to install with no special tools required, the new N-FAB TrailSlider is the ultimate upgrade for any 4-Runner, Wrangler, Tacoma, Colorado, and Ranger.

The N-FAB TrailSlider offers an easy installation that can be done in your own garage without the need for any special tools. The product comes with easy to understand vehicle specific installation instructions."

node.display_name: Camburg Engineering X-Joint Replacement Ball Joints
node.long_desc: High angle design;Maximum strength;Fully sealed
node.sales_desc:
Rounding out 2020, we developed the new Camburg X-Joint. It's an eXtreme performance, all-weather, all conditions, high angle ball-joint for our Camburg BJ performance upper control arms. These are much higher quality, considerably stronger and have an improved boot design that allows for higher angle use, better greasing and increased longevity. With higher strength heat-treated materials and an improved design, we were able to vastly improve upon what was available on the market. These are fully sealed and perfect for extreme conditions, so dirt, sand, rain, mud and snow are no match for them. The dual lip seal design on the boot insures the outside elements don't make their way in and contaminate the grease and joint.

The grease zerk fitting allows you to grease them on the truck without having to remove the boot. Our Camburg X-Joint is designed specifically for our ball-joint upper arms for optimum fit and maximum wheel travel. They do not retro-fit into uniball arms and are not designed for the stock sheet metal arms.

These fit Camburg P/N 310078 upper control arms.

node.display_name: Camburg Engineering Ford Raptor Front Coilover Spring Preload Spacers
node.long_desc: 1.5 2 inches of lift;Bolt-on design;Available in Red, Black, KINETIK Gray and Gold;Made in the USA
node.sales_desc:
Our Camburg preload spring spacers are a cost effective and easy way to lift the front of your 17-20 Ford Raptor while still keeping the plush factory ride. We offer them in red, black, KINETIK gray and gold versions. Don't confuse these with standard cheap spacer" lifts. These preload the coil spring, they do not space the shock down allowing the suspension to droop out too far and lose compression travel by bottoming out the shock sooner.

We CNC machine these in-house from aerospace quality 6061-T6 aluminum, then have them bead blasted, anodized and laser etched. These install easily onto your factory OEM Fox coilovers and lift the front end either 1.5 or 2 depending on which kit you go with. We recommend the 1.5 version to level the front end when running 35 tires and the 2 lift version when running larger 37 tires. These are not designed to be used with aftermarket coil springs on the OEM stock shocks.

On the 19-20 models with the electronic FOX Live Valve suspension you will need slightly modify the plastic wire retainer so that it presses back into the lower spring seat slot. You can do this with a file and/or small disc sander to reduce the thickness of the tab.

Made in the USA

To install these you will need to remove the coilovers from the truck. We recommend using a heavy duty spring compressor so you're able to collapse the spring enough to install our spacers onto the shock body which is a precision fit. You don't have to completely disassemble the shocks and springs.""

node.sales_desc: ynergy Manufacturing is an industry innovator and manufacturer of high-end automotive performance components. These components are predominantly made in the USA and are primarily for the off road aftermarket. Synergy has specialized in the manufacturing and distribution of premium suspension products and systems since 2005. In addition to suspension systems, Synergy also manufactures a complete line of heavy duty steering components, axle upgrades, skid plates, and other related products that dramatically improve vehicle on and off road capability, performance, and appearance. Recent research and development projects have also brought about several new cutting edge products for not just the off road aftermarket but for other motorsports, marine, and transportation applications

node.sales_desc: ICON bracket kit's are designed to provide a clean installation of LED lights. The brackets are constructed from 3/16 laser cut steel and are powder coated to a semi-gloss black finish."

Hides the gap between the frame and body;Quick and easy installation;Enhances your truck's appearance by providing a more finished look;Protects against damage from rocks, dirt, salt, road debris and weather elements;Made of high-density Polyethylene plastic;Limited Lifetime Warranty on material and workmanship;Includes: Pair of Inner Wheel Well Liners & mounting hardware;Aftermarket fender flares may need to be temporarily removed for installation;Made in the USA
node.sales_desc:
Give your rear wheel wells superior protection and a striking, new look with Rough Country's Rear Wheel Well Liners. Made of high-density Polyethylene plastic, these durable liners help conceal the unsightly gap between the body and frame which is more noticeable after lifting. The stylish, contoured design is perfectly tailored for a precise fit to your truck, while the all-black finish helps bring an aggressive look to the rear of your vehicle.

Rough Country Rear Wheel Well Liners offer an extra barrier of protection to help shield your wheel wells from rocks, mud, salt, and harsh weather. With all the small, hard to clean areas covered, cleanup is fast and simple.

Installation is easy too! Rough Country Rear Wheel Well Liners feature a bolt-on installation process that's easy enough to do with common tools in a home garage.

node.long_desc: DOT/SAE Certified for street legal use;Aggressive, black panel design;IP67 Waterproof housing;Includes easy plug-and-play harness adapter;100% bolt-on installation
node.sales_desc:
See more of the road ahead while giving your Jeep an aggressive look with Rough Country's DOT-certified 7in LED Projection Headlights. These easy-to-install headlights offer incredible illumination while transforming the look of your front-end.

Rough Country's LED Projection Headlights are DOT/SAE certified to be street legal, and feature a durable IP67 waterproof housing for a long lifespan of illumination. Each headlight kit features a 100% bolt-on installation process and includes a handy adapter for easy plug-and-play setup.

With 60 watts /4800 lumen high beams and 40 watt / 3200 lumen low beams, Rough Country's LED Projection Headlights offer plenty of illumination. The black interior design and stacked lamps give the headlight an interesting look that dresses up your front-end design.

Give the front-end of your truck or jeep a unique look with Rough Country's Mesh Grille kit. This grille replacement kit swaps out your stock grille with the eye-catching, head-turning good looks of this aftermarket upgrade. With a unique, laser-cut mesh pattern surrounded by stylish, stainless steel button-head bolts, this grill gives your truck a more menacing look that's sure to draw attention. Each kit is powder coated black to resist corrosion and give a long lifespan of good looks!

node.display_name: Fishbone Offroad Tool and Recovery Bag
node.long_desc: 18 x 8" x 8" duffel bag;Easy to clean and wash;Nylon straps;High quality and smooth zippers;Resistant fabric;Perfect for tools and gear;Made in the U.S.A."
node.sales_desc: Fishbone's latest Tool and Recovery Bag is the perfect container for keeping your vehicle's organizational state in perfect order! Whether you're headed out on your next adventure, or headed to the gym, this duffel will keep all your stuff safe and off the floor!

node.sales_desc: Want some adventure? Unlock your truck's potential with Torq Engineering's new 2 lift kit. This easy to install lift kit lifts your truck 2" inches allowing larger tires, greater ground clearance and improved performance, yet keeps the factory ride and drive."

node.long_desc: Levels front of your truck and adds aggressive lifted stance;Upper coil /strut spacers maintain a factory ride and position;Lifted rear coil spacers maintain factory shocks and ride;Maintains factory CV angles with differential and skid plate drop spacers;Includes extended bump stops to prevent over travel of struts and CV joints;Machined from billet aluminum;Simple bolt-on installation;Factory struts can be maintained;Limited Lifetime Warranty;Made in the USA
node.sales_desc: Unleash the Monster with Torq Engineering's new 3/1 leveling lift kit levels out the truck while adding a slight lift for larger tires, greater ground clearance and improved performance, yet keeps the factory ride and drive.

node.display_name: ICON Vehicle Dynamics Dual Steering Stabilizer Bracket Kits
Pro Comp Flex Fit Baseball Caps

node.sales_desc: The Falken Wildpeak A/T3W is engineered for adventure, any time and in any weather. The A/T3W combines aggressive off-road ability and rugged terrain driving without compromise on the pavement. An optimized tread design combined with a silica tread compound enable the A/T3W to excel in three areas: wear, winter, and wet performance. Designed for severe snow conditions, every A/T3W tire is qualified by the Rubber Manufacturers Association for the Three Peak Mountain Snow Flake (3PMSF) symbol. The A/T3W is packed with technology, from Falken's patented 3D Canyon Sipes to an all-new proprietary lower sidewall. Full-depth sipes and grooves maintain consistent performance and appearance throughout the life of the tire.

node.display_name: Trail Gear DuraLine Tree Saver Straps

node.sales_desc: Trusted by the pros to take on the harshest conditions, the tough Wildpeak M/T is built to get you there and back whether you're on the pavement, mud, snow or rocks. The M/T features Falken's proprietary three-ply DURASPEC Sidewall Technology developed to sustain the most punishing off-road conditions. DURASPEC also features two high ply turn-ups that provide an additional layer of protection and durability. An aggressive upper sidewall provides additional traction at low air pressures on rugged terrain. The Wildpeak M/T also features exceptional road manners thanks to an optimized variable three-pitch tread pattern and precision manufacturing technology.

node.sales_desc: Got rid of your spare? This Maxbilt Offroad delete plate cleans up the space left behind from that flimsy factory spare tire mount, and won't break the bank!

node.display_name: DV8 Offroad Front Bumper Adapter Bracket
node.long_desc: Brackets allow any DV8 Offroad front bumper to be mounted on a vehivles frame ;Mounting hardware included;No drilling required;Limited warranty
node.sales_desc: The DV8 Offroad brackets allow for the mounting of any DV8 Offroad front bumper to the frame with no drilling! This bracket spaces the bumper the ideal distance away from the body and allows for the mounting of most aftermarket bumpers. The kit comes with all necessary hardware to install the bracket and allows you to use the hardware that comes with your aftermarket bumper to complete the install. Great for those who don't want to wallow out the frame holes to mount their front bumper!

node.long_desc: Made of rugged polycarbonate;Lens made of PMMA;Sold as a pair;Waterproof rate: IP 68;LED: 9 3W high intensity CREE LEDs;Color Temperature: 6500K/White 3000K/Turn Signal;Life Span: 50000h Operating;Lumens Output: 2400lm;Turn Light: 450lm;Limited warranty
node.sales_desc: The DV8 Offroad LED mirror housing allows drivers to have a wider range of visibility at night. LEDs are built into the mirror housings and are angled slightly outward from the center of the vehicle to promote a better field of view. DV8 Off Road LED mirrors allow for a safer drive on dark roads and better visibility during late night offroad excursions. The DV8 mirror housings also work as a turn signal to replace the factory fender signals when moving to aftermarket fenders.

node.display_name: DV8 Offroad BRS Pro Series LED Light Bars
node.long_desc: DV8 Optical Technology and cutting edge design delivers unparalleled light output;Dual and single row light bars ;Have a black textured face;Polycarbonate lens;IP68 rated;3W Cree Led's;Side and bottom mounts options;Limited warranty
node.sales_desc: DV8 Optical Technology and cutting edge design delivers unparalled light output. These pro lights have a black textured face, polycarbonate lens, are IP68 rated, with 3W Cree Led's rated to 50,000 hours and have side and bottom mounts.

Exceptionally durable radial tire, the Blackwater Evolution provides a smooth, stable and predictable ride. Innovative, non-directional design for awesome traction with smooth riding, superb handling 8-ply-rated radial construction. Specifically engineered for excellent performance on side-by-side UTV applications with tough rubber compound offers exceptional wear and abrasion resistance.

The Mud Lite II is a new twist on a proven classic for UTVs and ATVs. Part of the popular Mud Lite family, this redesigned tread pattern provides better traction, improves mud clean-out and improves ride comfort. This tire also has improved shoulder protection, mud breaking lugs and stabilizing cords to reduce flex and is available in sizes 23-30-inches tall, on 12 and 14-inch rims.

node.display_name: ITP Ultra Cross R Spec Tires
node.sales_desc: The Ultra Cross R Spec has proven itself as the radial tire of choice for extreme desert riding. The non-directional tread design enhances traction and control on smooth and slippery surfaces while the super deep rim guard offers the best wheel/lip protection in the business. The popular 14-inch wheel diameter expands wheel style choices and provides improved sidewall compliance and the more openly spaced tread pattern makes the Ultra Cross R Spec tire a superb option for desert and slick rock conditions.

node.display_name: ITP Ultra Cross R Spec Race Tires
node.sales_desc: You can feel confident riding the Ultra Cross R Spec Race tires during extreme desert racing. With an 8-ply radial construction made from ITP's Tough Tread" rubber compound, these racing tires provide puncture resistance for the most extreme terrain. The unique, multi-surface, non-directional tread design improves off-road traction and versatility. It is the radial tire of choice for #TeamITP's extreme desert racing."

This tire handles the toughest and heaviest UTV applications and is excellent on heavier ATVs as well. Extended-life rubber compound and innovative overlapping tread pattern provide a smooth, predictable ride as well as slow wear characteristics - this is one of the highest-mileage tire ITP has ever produced!

node.display_name: Innovative JK Products Rear Seat Recline Kits
node.long_desc: Gain inches of rear seat recline for much improved rear seat passenger comfort;Fabricated from industrial polymer, DELRIN, to provide a safe, durable, and cleanly integrated solution;Black color to match factory black of the seat components;Excellent durability and strength in compression;Reduced stress to factory brackets;Will never peel, crack, or flake;Installation of this kit requires no changes or modification to any of the seat belt mounting points;Locking conical washer, 18mm bolt head and durable phosphate coating just like the factory bolt;Certified Class 10.9 Factory Style SEM Bolts;Factory SEM bolts and supplied new SEM bolts maintain full thread engagement at all 7 anchor points;Kit includes: 7 High quality manufactured spacers, 4 high quality certified class 10.9 Factory Style SEM Bolts, easy to follow instructions;Made in the USA
node.sales_desc: Do your passengers complain about the rear seat comfort and/or sitting too upright in your Jeep 4-door? Of course they do, it's not comfortable at all! Well here is an innovative solution to a common complaint. Some have even indicated their family and friends are once again willing to ride in the back, in comfort, after installation of this kit! The Innovative JK Products original patented kit allows you to gain inches of rear seat recline. It does not sound like a lot, but it makes a world of difference! The spacers install easily underneath the factory seat brackets to rock the seat back" to a more comfortable position. The ability of the seat to fold up and down still functions as normal. The kit is also compatible with a number of rear cargo area accessories."

node.long_desc: Matte black powder coat finish;Made of steel;Works with Fab Fours wheels;Sold as a set of 4 or individually;Multiple unique designs;Protects the wheel;Quickly change the style of the wheel;Easy Installation
node.sales_desc: Your WheelYour StyleCreate your own unique wheel by combining Fab Four wheels with these optional wheel rings.

node.long_desc: Muscular stamped steel construction;Patented design features sculpted contours and sweeping arches;Features built-in winch plate and massive 1-inch thick recovery hooks;Octagonal pockets accept factory JL / JT fog lights;Easy bolt-on installation
node.sales_desc: Rugged Ridge could tell you what's behind the name, but they would prefer to define it. Venator represents a sharp departure from typical bumper design- a dominant form, carefully crafted in clay and then forged in steel. Muscular contours and chiseled facets combine with the Venators radical arches, creating a bumper that clearly complements the overall aesthetics of the JL / JT, rather than fighting them. It's like nothing you've seen yet, but we should warn you; the Venator contains some intense visual content- viewer discretion is advised.

node.long_desc: Driver or passenger side;Sold individually - 2 required
node.sales_desc: Omix proudly offers a vast collection of OE quality replacement parts for Jeep & Willys vehicles to help keep the Jeep legend alive. Sold individually- 2 required.

node.long_desc: Factory style replacement;Installs between the front differential cover and the cross member
node.sales_desc: Omix proudly offers a vast collection of OE quality replacement parts for Jeep & Willys vehicles to help keep the Jeep legend alive. This replacement front axle housing bracket installs between the front differential cover and the cross member.

node.long_desc: Fits TeraFlex Nomad wheels;Black polyethylene thermoplastic with UV inhibiters to resist color fading;Secures with locking lugs on ring
node.sales_desc: These TeraFlex Nomad Rash Rings protect the lip of your TeraFlex Nomad Off-Road Wheel from trail carnage or even parking lot damage. Constructed from polyethylene thermoplastic with UV inhibitors to resist color fading. Secures to your wheel with locking lugs.

node.display_name: MSA Wheels M36 Switch - Machined / Black
node.sales_desc: Classic directional spoke design with offroad inspired milled accents on automotive grade gloss black paint. The M36 Switch is the future of offroad performance wheels in a huge variety of sizes and finishes. Directional eight spoke design and subtle milled accents compliment any color of machine or theme. Available in milled gloss black paint or machined gloss black, the M36 Switch defines a new generation of MSA Offroad Wheels. Available in a variety of fitments for all makes and models of ATVs and UTVs. Interchangeable MSA-CAP and center star for full customization. This is next level off-road performance.

node.display_name: Safe Jack Never Miss Hitch System
node.long_desc: Reduces frustration and aggravation;Fool proof sighting system lets one person back up to a trailer perfectly the first time, every time;6x faster saves time-save multiple attempts and repeatedly getting in and out of your vehicle;Protects your bumper from being damaged by the trailer coupler;Perfect alignment reduces the risk of injury from trying to force the hitch to align;Reduces risk of injury
node.sales_desc: Save yourself all the aggravation with Uncle Norm's Never Miss Hitch System! Forget the days of making 6 trips to the back of your rig to see how close your hitch ball is to the trailer. Forget hurting your back trying to move the trailer and save yourself that trip to the doctor. Hitch up to your trailer the first time, every time by yourself with rifle like accuracy! This unique 3 point sight system makes it impossible to miss. Now you can hook and go when you want because you can do it yourself.

node.display_name: Bartact Universal Between the Seat Bag & Pet Dividers
node.long_desc: 4 exterior mesh pockets - 2 front & 2 rear;Large enough to fully fit large cell phones or water bottles;A large interior velcro-top compartment;Fade resistant;Same fabric and materials used for Bartact seat covers;Available with an interchangeable top color;Quick release;All bags come with modular side release buckles, allowing you to take them with you easily wherever you might go;Proudly made in the U.S.A.
node.sales_desc: You can now match your seat covers with quick-release removable cargo/pet divider & seat back storage bag! Bartact has created the first ever Cargo/Pet Divider or seat back/front bag that can fit in any of the following locations: between the front seats, on the back of any front seat with adjustable headrests, in the middle of any rear bench with a center headrest, on the back of any bench with adjustable headrests, or as a small backpack.

node.long_desc: When paired with the app, this receiver allows the user to control the winch;Also provides winch load, battery voltage, and winch motor temperature feedback;100'+ wireless range;Rugged construction fully molded housing offers IP68 waterproof sealing;Quick to install receiver mounts to any tube or flat surface;Wiring takes less than 5 minutes on most models;Easy to connect;iOS and Android compatible and connects via Bluetooth;1-year limited warranty;Download for free from Google Play and Apple App stores;Designed to work offline and without service;Layout optimized for one-handed winch control;Real time winch feedback displayed on screen;Built-in help and tutorial allows any user to easily connect their phone to their HUB Receiver;Users can easily pair and switch between multiple HUB Receivers
node.sales_desc: Warn Industries is excited to launch the all new HUB Receiver and App. This first-of-its-kind technology allows users to wirelessly control and monitor their winch using their phone or any other smart device. A variety of receiver models are available to control most winches on the market.

node.long_desc: Ultra low-profile design with a stylish matte black finish;Integrated luminous bed rail light;Carpeted underpanels provide a finished OEM look;Dual action tailgate seal for easy operation;Made in the USA
node.sales_desc:
A hard folding truck bed cover that comes with overwhelming new features and is topped off with an alluring matte finish. The Ultra Flex is in a category of its own. From the irresistible outward appearance to each component beneath the cover, the Ultra Flex has been carefully crafted to be the ultimate all-purpose truck bed cover.

All-new features that accompany the Ultra Flex include an integrated luminous rail light system for enhanced night vision, and a dual action tailgate seal, allowing for easy operation and you to close the tailgate with the cover-up or down. Multiple riding positions allow the user to ride with full access to their bed, and full weather protection is available if the cover is in the fully closed position.

Ultra Flex is an easy clamp-on application and can be installed and removed easily with our newly designed L-Rail's. What's more, the Ultra Flex is backed by a 5-year warranty, making it the most desirable folding cover on the market.

node.long_desc: Exclusive 10 tumbler double bitted lock with built in weather seals;Pry-Guard locking system featuring 1/8 thick welded steel components;Includes two removable trays to organize your gear;Welded 16 gauge steel construction;Durable texture powder coat finish;Weather resistant lid design incorporates an exclusive Pin-Lock hinging system for added security;Supports up to 40 lbs.;Mounting hardware provided;Mounts to existing OEM mounting points in the vehicle tailgate"
node.sales_desc:
This heavy-duty, high security lock box mounts on the inside of the Jeep Wrangler JK tailgate providing ample secure storage for tools and other gear. The door folds down creating a work table for cooking or quick sorting and access of your stuff. The Tailgate Lock Box comes equipped with 2 removable shelves for organization of smaller items.

The entire Tuffy JK Tailgate Lock Box is constructed using welded 16-gauge steel, heavy duty fasteners and is covered with a durable textured powder coat finish. Heavy-duty construction that exceeds human seat belt safety standards;Quick and easy to put on and take off;Perfect for trips both in the car and on foot;Keeps pressure and stress off of your pet's neck, significantly reducing the chance of injury;Keeps any pressure on its chest - not its neck;Patented design can withstand extreme pressure
node.sales_desc:
An unrestrained pet in a moving vehicle can be dangerous, not only to the pet but also to yourself in the event of an accident. The patented design of the WeatherTech Pet Safety Harness provides your pet with the maximum level of safety and comfort, and it uses your vehicle's existing seat belts to keep your pet safe and secure on the road!

Your vehicle's seat belt is one of its most important safety features, and the WeatherTech Pet Harness lets you buckle your pet just like you would yourself. The harness is easy to put on and, unlike a traditional leash and/or collar, keeps any pressure or stress generated from the movement of the vehicle off of your pet's neck and onto its chest. The pet harness features a short tether that has two openings. Just pass your vehicle's seat belt through one of these openings and click the buckles together. Use the opening closer to your pet if you want to limit the amount of movement your pet is allowed. The WeatherTech Pet Harness can also be used in the cargo area of your vehicle with a climbing grade locking carabiner.

In the event of an accident, a large unrestrained pet can exert upwards of 2,500 pounds of force to itself and the other occupants of the vehicle. The WeatherTech Pet Safety Harness's unique patented design and heavy duty construction make it one of the strongest and safest pet travel harnesses available. The webbing material exceeds S.A.E. standards for human seat belts, and it has been independently tested to human seat belt safety standards. The WeatherTech Pet Safety Harness can also be used even if your pet isn't in your vehicle. The same tether that keeps your pet safe during car rides can also be hooked to your pet's leash for walks around the neighborhood or hiking down trails. The harness keeps any pressure from your pet pulling against you on its chest, not its neck!

Sizing

The Scosche APK-BP0 Boombottle MM accessory plate mounting kit is perfect for mounting your Boombottle MM to most flat, textured surfaces such as a home table, garage workbench, office desk and more. The soft, flexible rubber base with the Stickgrip suction bottom adheres to flat, textured surfaces, and are perfect for moving from one flat surface to another. node.sales_desc:
Wireless charging's rapid ongoing growth has led to some poor-quality and low performance products being introduced that could also be unsafe. Qi Certified products, like our wireless charging products, have been thoroughly tested by independent laboratories to ensure their safety, compatibility and energy efficiency.

Scosche's products are designated as Qi Certified by the Wireless Power Consortium. Others may use terms like Qi compliant, Qi compatible and Works with Qi, but these terms are not the same as Qi Certified and products using such terms have not undergone Qi certification testing."
